alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bourbon County through 245 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Bronson, or 12 miles southwest of Mound City, moving east at 40 mph. Other storm in Bourbon County will also occur toward the Ft Scott area. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Scott... Marmaton... Uniontown... Fulton... Redfield... Mapleton... Petersburg... Hammond... Devon... Harding... Xenia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
